source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran
short_text: The word Fatir of the first very verse is the title given to this Surah, which simply means that it is a Surah in which the word Fatir has occurred. The other name is Al Malaika, which also occurs in the first verse.
text:
The word Fatir of the first very verse is the title given to this Surah, which simply means that it is a Surah in which the word Fatir has occurred. The other name is Al Malaika, which also occurs in the first verse.

Period of Revelation

The internal evidence of the style shows that the period of the revelation of this Surah is probably the middle Makkan period, and especially that part of it, when antagonism had grown quite strong and every sort of mischief was being adopted to frustrate the mission of the Holy Prophet.

Subject Matter and Theme

The discourse is meant to warn and reprove the people of Makkah and their chiefs for their antagonistic attitude that they had then adopted towards the Holy Prophet's message of Tauhid, like a well wisher, and also to admonish them like a teacher, as if to say: "O foolish people, the way to which this Prophet is calling you is to your own advantage. Your anger, your tricks and machinations against it and your conspiracies and designs to frustrate it are not directed against him but against your own selves. If you do not listen to him, you will be harming your own selves, not him. Just consider and ponder over what he says : there is nothing wrong in it. He repudiates shirk. If you look around carefully, you will yourself realize that there is no basis for shirk in the world. He presents the doctrine of Tauhid. If you use your common sense, you will come to the conclusion that there is no being, beside Allah, Creator of the Universe, which might possess divine
attributes and powers and authority. He tells you that you have not been created to be irresponsible in this world, but you have to render an account of your deeds before your God, and that there is life after the life of this world when everyone will meet the consequences of what he has done here. If you thing a little you will see that your doubts and your astonishment about it are absolutely baseless. Don't you see the phenomenon of the reproduction of creation day and night. How can then your own recreation be impossible for that God Who created you from an insignificant sperm drop? Doesn't your own intellect testify that the good and the evil cannot be alike? Then think and judge for yourselves as to what is reasonable, should the good and the evil meet with the same fate and end up in the dust, or should the good be requited with good and the evil with evil? Now, if you do not admit and acknowledge these rational and reasonable things and do not abandon your false gods, and
wish to continue living only as irresponsible people in the world, the Prophet will not lose anything. It is you yourselves only who will suffer the consequences. The Prophet's only responsibility was to make the truth plain to you, which be has done."

In this connection, the Holy Prophet has been consoled again and again, as if to say :"When you are doing full justice to the preaching of your mission, you do not incur any responsibility for those who persist in their error and do not accept and follow the right way." Furthermore, he has also been consoled to the effect "You should neither grieve on account of those who do not want to believe, nor consume yourself with the thought of how to bring them to the rights path. Instead of this, you should pay your full attention to those who are inclined to listen to you."

The believers also, in this connection, have been given the good news so that they may feel strengthened and encouraged and remain steadfast on the path of the truth with full faith in the promises made by Allah.
description: The surah that opens with the praise of God as The Originator of the heavens and the earth. It takes its name from the word “fāṭir” (orginator), which occurs in verse 1. The surah airms God’s power and Creation and contrasts this with the powerlessness and uselessness of the “partners” set up by the idolaters. The surah warns the idolaters of their punishment and comforts the Prophet through mention of previous messengers who were also rejected as liars. The great rewards that await believers are described.The surah is also known as: Sole Originator, The Bringer into Being, The Creator.

Efendi Nahi.verse 35:1: Falenderimi qoftë për Perëndinë, krijuesit të qiejve, dhe Tokës, i cili i ka bërë engjëjt pejgamberë me krahë, me nga dy, tre dhe katër.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:2: Atë që Perëndia ua ka dërguar njerëzve nga mëshira e Tij, nuk mund ta pengojë askush, e atë që Ai e pengon – askush nuk mundet, pas Tij, ta jap; Ai është i Plotëfuqishëm dhe i Gjithëdijshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:3: O njerëz! Kujtonie dhuntinë e Perëndisë juve.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:4: Nëse ata ty (o Muhammed!) të konsiderojnë gënjeshtar, e me të vërtetë, edhe para teje, pejgamberët i kanë konsideruar gënjeshtarë, e te Perëndia kthehen të gjitha punët.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:5: O njerëz! Padyshim, premtimi i Perëndisë është i vërtetë, e mos t’ju mashtrojë, kurrsesi, jeta e kësaj bote dhe le të mos ju mashtrojë, kurrsesi mashtruesi në Perëndinë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:6: Me të vërtetë, djalli është armik për ju, andaj merreni atë për armik! Ai vetëm i thërret ithtarët e vet që të bëhen shokë të zjarrit.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:7: Për ata që nuk besojnë ka dënim të rëndë, e për ata që besojnë dhe punojnë vepra të mira ka falje dhe shpërblim të madh.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:8: E vallë, a është ai që iu kanë zbukuruar veprat e tij të këqia dhe i duken ato të mira (si ai që është i i udhëzuar në rrugë të drejtë)? Me të vërtetë, Perëndia e shpie në humbje kë të dojë, dhe e udhëzon në rrugë të drejtë kë të dojë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:9: Dhe, Perëndia – është ai që dërgon erërat, që i lëvizin retë, dhe Ne i drejtojmë ato në viset e vdekura, e me to e gjallërojmë tokën pas vdekjes së saj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:10: Kush dëshiron madhërinë, e tërë madhëria është e Perëndisë, (andaj kërkoni prej Tij).
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:11: Perëndia, u ka krijuar së pari prej dheut, pastaj nga pika e ujit (farës – spermës), dhe më në fund u ka bërë çifte (meshkuj e femra).
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:12: As dy detet nuk janë të njëjta: njëri është i ëmbël dhe i këndshëm, e që uji i pihet lehtë, e tjetri është i njelmët dhe i idhët.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:13: Ai (Perëndia) e shpie natën (e zgjatë njërën dhe shkurton tjetrën), dhe e ka nënshtruar Diellin dhe Hënën – secili lëvizë deri në kohën e caktuar; ky është Perëndia, Zoti juaj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:14: Nëse ju i thërrisni ata, thirrjen tuaj ata nuk e dëgjojnë, e (edhe) sikur ta dëgjonin, nuk do t’ju përgjigjeshin.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:15: O njerëz! Ju jeni të varfër te Perëndia, (nevojtarë për çdo gjë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:16: Nëse don (Ai), ju zhdukë dhe sjellë krijesa të reja,
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:17: kjo për Perëndinë nuk është vështirë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:18: Dhe, asnjë mëkatarë nuk do ta bartë mëkatin e tjetrit.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:19: Nuk janë, kurrsesi, njësoj i verbëti dhe ai që sheh,
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:22: as nuk janë, kurrsesi, të barabartë, të gjallët dhe të vdekurit.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:24: Ne të kemi dërguar ty me të Vërtetën – sihariq dhe paralajmërues; e nuk ka pasur asnjë popull që të mos i ketë ardhur paralajmërues.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:25: E, nëse ata të konsiderojnë ty gënjeshtar, e madje edhe paraardhësit e këtyre i kanë përgënjeshtruar pejgamberët.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:26: Pastaj, Unë i kam dënuar mohuesit, e çfarë ka qenë dënimi Im!
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:27: Vallë, a nuk di ti, që Perëndia e lëshon ujin prej qiellit, e që Ne, me të krijojmë frute llojesh e ngjyrash të ndryshme; e nëpër male gjenden rrugë të bardha dhe të kuqe, ngjyrash të ndryshme, dhe krejtësisht të zeza.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:28: Ka edhe njerëz, edhe shtazë, edhe bagëti – po ashtu llojesh të ndryshme.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:29: Padyshim, ata që e lexojnë Librin e Perëndisë dhe kryejnë namazin, dhe haptazi e fshehurazi japin nga ajo me çka i kemi furnizuar Ne, shpresojnë shpërblimin që nuk do të humbas,
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:30: që (Ai) t’jua plotësojë shpërblimin dhe që t’ju shtojë atyre nga dhuntitë e Tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:31: E, atë që ta kemi shpallur ty prej Librit, është e vërtetë e saktë, duke qenë vërtetues për atë që është shpallur para tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:32: Pastaj, Ne u kemi dhënë Librin (Kur’anin) robërve Tanë të zgjedhur.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:33: xhennetet e Adnit në të cilin hyjnë ata, duke u veshur me bylyzykë të arit dhe margaritarë, veshja e tyre, në to, është prej mëndafshi.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:34: Dhe thonë ata: “Falenderojmë Perëndinë, i cili e ka zhdukru hidhërimin nga ne.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:35: i cili, me mirësinë e Tij na ka shpënë në shtëpinë e banimit të përhershëm, në të cilën nuk do të lodhemi dhe në të cilën nk do të rraskapitemi”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:36: E, për ata që nuk besojnë është zjarri i skëterrës, ata nuk do të dënohen (me vdekje), dhe nuk do të vdesin, dhe as që do t’u lehtësohet dënimi në të, - ja kështu, Ne do ta dënojmë çdo mohues, -
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:37: ata, në të, do të thërrasin (duke bërtitur): “O Zoti ynë, nxirrna (prej zjarrit), do të bëjmë vepra të mira, e jo asosh çfarë kemi bërë”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:38: me të vërtetë, Perëndia është i Gjithëdijshëm për sekretet e qiejve dhe të Tokës.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:39: Ai u ka bërë juve zëvendës (njërin pas tjetrit) në Tokë; e kush nuk beson, mosbesimi i tij është në dëm të tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:40: Thuaju atyre: “A i keni pa shokët tuaj (idhujt) që i adhuroni, përveç Perëndisë? Më tregoni Mua – se çka kanë krijuar ata në Tokë ose a kanë marrë pjesë në krijimin e qiejve, ose a u kemi dhënë Ne atyre një Libër, e ata në të kanë argument për këtë (çështje)?” Jo, por zullumqarët i premtojnë njëri-tjetrit vetëm mashtrime.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:41: Me të vërtetë, Perëndia mbron ekuilibrin e qiejve dhe Tokës nga shkatërrimi.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:42: Dhe, ata janë betuar në Perëndinë, me betimin e rëndë (që) nse iu vie paralajmërues, ata – në të vërtetë, do të jenë ndër më të udhëzuarit nga çdo popull tjetër.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:43: (për) mendjemadhësinë në Tokë dhe dinakëritë e shëmtuara që e godasin vetëm pronarin e tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:44: Vallë, a nuk kanë udhëtuar ata nëpër botë e të shohin si ka qenë përfundimi i të mëparshmëve, e të cilët kanë qenë më të fortë se këta? Dhe, Perëndisë nuk mund t’i ikë (shpëtojë) asgjë, (as) në qiej as në Tokë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 35:45: E, sikur Perëndia t’i dënonte njerëzit sipas veprave (të këqia) që bëjnë, nuk do të mbetej në sipërfaqen e Tokës asgjë (e gjallë), por Ai i shtyen ata deri në afatin e caktuar, dhe kur t’u vie afati i tyre, - Perëndia, me të vërtetë, i sheh mirë robërit e Vet.

null.verse 35:1: Göyləri və yeri yoxdan yaradan, ikiqanadlı, üçqanadlı və dördqanadlı mələkləri (peyğəmbərlərə) elçi edən Allaha həmd olsun! (Allah) məxluqatda istədiyini artırar.
null.verse 35:2: Allahın insanlara əta etdiyi mərhəmətə (verdiyi ne'mətə, ruziyə) heç kəs mane ola bilməz.
null.verse 35:3: Ey insanlar! Allahın sizə olan ne'mətini yada salın.
null.verse 35:4: Əgər (bu müşriklər) səni təkzib etsələr (heç ürəyini sıxma).
null.verse 35:5: Ey insanlar! Şübhəsiz ki, Allahın (qiyamət barəsindəki) və'di haqdır.
null.verse 35:6: Həqiqətən, Şeytan sizin düşməninizdir, onu (özünüzə) düşmən tutun.
null.verse 35:7: Kafir olanları şiddətli əzab, iman gətirib yaxşı işlər görənləri isə bağışlanma və böyük bir mükafat (Cənnət) gözləyir!
null.verse 35:8: Pis əməli (Şeytan tərəfindən) özünə yaxşı göstərilib onu yaxşı görən (Allahın doğru yola yönəltdiyi kimsəyə bənzəyirmi?!) Şübhəsiz ki, Allah istədiyini zəlalətə, istədiyini də doğru yola salar.
null.verse 35:9: Buludları hərəkətə gətirən küləkləri Allahdır göndərən! Biz (o buludları) quru (ölü) bir məmləkətə tərəf qovub, öldükdən sonra torpağı onunla dirildirik.
null.verse 35:10: Hər kəs (dünyada) izzət-qüdrət (şərəf-şan) istəsə, (bilsin ki, dünyada da, axirətdə də) bütün izzət-qüdrət (şərəf-şan) ancaq Allaha məxsusdur.
null.verse 35:11: Allah sizi (atanız Adəmi) torpaqdan, sonra nütfədən xəlq etmiş, sonra da sizi (kişi və qadın olmaqla) cüt-cüt yaratmışdır.
null.verse 35:12: İki dəniz eyni deyildir.
null.verse 35:13: (Allah) gecəni gündüzə, güzdüzü də gecəyə qatar.
null.verse 35:14: Əgər siz onları çağırsanız (dua etsəniz), onlar sizin çağırışınızı eşitməzlər; eşitsələr də cavab verə bilməzlər (çünki Allah onlara nitq qabiliyyəti verməmişdir).
null.verse 35:15: Ey insanlar! Siz Allaha möhtacsınız.
null.verse 35:16: Əgər istəsə, sizi yox edib (yerinizə) başqa bir məxluq gətirər.
null.verse 35:17: Bu, Allah üçün çətin deyildir!
null.verse 35:18: Heç bir günahkar başqasının günahını daşımaz.
null.verse 35:19: Kor ilə görən eyni olaz.
null.verse 35:21: Kölgə (sərin) ilə isti (eyni olmaz).
null.verse 35:22: Dirilərlə ölülər də eyni deyillər! (Bütün bunlar kimi kafirlə mö'min, küfrlə iman, Cəhənnəmlə Cənnət, batillə haqq da eyni olmazlar!) Şübhəsiz ki, Allah dilədiyinə (ayələrini) eşitdirər.
null.verse 35:23: Sən ancaq (müşrikləri, kafirləri Allahın əzabı ilə) qorxudan bir peyğəmbərsən!
null.verse 35:24: Doğrudan da, Biz səni haqla (Qur'anla) müjdə verən və qorxudan bir peyğəmbər olaraq göndərdik.
null.verse 35:25: Əgər onlar (Məkkə müşrikləri) səni yalançı saysalar (heç ürəyini qısma).
null.verse 35:26: Sonra Mən o küfr edənləri (əzabla) yaxaladım.
null.verse 35:27: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Məgər Allahın göydən bir yağmur yağdırdığını görmürsənmi?! Sonra Biz onunla növbənöv meyvələr yetişdirdik və dağlarda müxtəlif rəngli - ağ, qırmızı, tünd qara yollar (yaxud tünd qara qayalar) peyda etdik.
null.verse 35:28: İnsanların, (yer üzündə gəzən) heyvanların və davarların da bu cür müxtəlif rəngləri vardır.
null.verse 35:29: Allahın Kitabını oxuyan, namaz qılan, özlərinə verdiyimiz ruzilərdən (Allah yolunda) gizli və aşkar xərcləyənlər kasad olmayacaq bir ticarət (savab) umarlar ki,
null.verse 35:30: (Allah) onlara (əməllərinin) mükafatlarını versin və ?z lütfündən (kərəmindən) onlara artırsın! Həqiqətən, (Allah) bağışlayandır, qədirbiləndir! (Bəndələrinə Ona etdikləri şükür müqabilində bol ne'mət əta edər).
null.verse 35:31: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Sənə özündən əvvəlkiləri təsdiqləyici olaraq vəhy etdiyimiz Kitab (Qur'an) haqdır.
null.verse 35:32: Sonra Kitabı bəndələrimizdən seçdiklərimizə (Muhəmməd ümmətinə) miras verdik.
null.verse 35:33: Onlar Ədn cənnətlərinə daxil olacaq, orada altun bilərziklər və incilərlə bəzənəcəklər.
null.verse 35:34: Onlar deyəcəklər: "Qəm-qüssəni bizdən uzaq edən Allaha həmd olsun.
null.verse 35:35: Elə bir Rəbb ki, ?z lütfü (kərəmi) ilə bizi (əbədi qalacağımız) iqamətgahda yerləşdirdi.
null.verse 35:36: Kafir olanları cəhənnəm odu gözləyir.
null.verse 35:37: Onlar orada fəryad edib deyəcəklər: "Ey Rəbbimiz! Bizi buradan çıxart ki, saleh əməllər edək.
null.verse 35:38: Şübhəsiz ki, Allah göylərin və yerin qeybini (gözə görünməyən sirlərini) bilir.
null.verse 35:39: Sizi yer üzünün varisləri edən (bir-birinizin yerinə gətirən) Odur.
null.verse 35:40: (Ya Rəsulum! Məkkə müşriklərinə) de: "Mənə bir göstərin (deyin) görüm, Allahdan başqa ibadət etdikləriniz yer üzündə (yaxud yerdən və yerə bənzər şeylərdən) nəyi yaradıblar? Yoxsa onların göylərdə (Allahla) bir şərikliyi var? Yaxud onlara (ilahi) bir kitab vermişik və (Allaha şərik qoşmaq barəsində) oradakı bir dəlilə istinad edirlər?! Xeyr, o zalımlar (bütlərin onlar üçün şəfaət edəcəyi haqda) bir-birinə ancaq yalan və'd verirlər.
null.verse 35:41: Həqiqətən, Allah göyləri və yeri zaval tapmasınlar (öz mehvərindən çıxmasınlar) deyə, tutub saxlayır.
null.verse 35:42: (Məkkə müşrikləri) özlərinə (Allahın əzabı ilə) qorxudan bir peyğəmbər gələcəyi təqdirdə (yəhudi, xaçpərəst və başqaları kimi) hər hansı ümmətdən daha artıq doğru yolda olacaqları barədə Allaha çox möhkəm and içmişdilər.
null.verse 35:43: (Bu isə onların) yer üzündə təkəbbür göstərmələri (iman gətirməyi özlərinə sığışdırmamaları) və pis əməlləri ucbatından idi.
null.verse 35:44: Məgər onlar yer üzündə dolaşıb özlərindən əvvəlkilərin axırının necə olduğunu görmürlərmi? Halbuki onlar bunlardan daha qüvvətli idilər.
null.verse 35:45: Əgər Allah insanları etdikləri günahlara görə cəzalandırsaydı, (Yer) üzündə bir nəfəri belə (sağ) qoymazdı.

null.verse 35:1: Hvaljen neka je Allah, stvoritelj nebesa i Zemlje, koji meleke sa po dva, tri i četiri krila čini izaslanicima; On onome što stvara dodaje što hoće, On, uistinu, sve može.
null.verse 35:2: Milost koju Allah podari ljudima niko ne može uskratiti, a ono što On uskrati niko ne može, poslije Njega, dati; On je silan i mudar.
null.verse 35:3: O ljudi, sjetite se milosti kojom vas Allah obasipa.
null.verse 35:4: Ako te oni u laž utjeruju, pa - i prije tebe su poslanike u laž utjerivali; a Allahu će se sve vratiti.
null.verse 35:5: O ljudi, Allahova prijetnja je, zaista, istina, pa neka vas nikako život na ovome svijetu ne zaslijepi i neka vas šejtan u Allaha ne pokoleba.
null.verse 35:6: Šejtan je, uistinu, vaš neprijatelj, pa ga takvim i smatrajte! On poziva pristaše svoje da budu stanovnici u vatri.
null.verse 35:7: One koji ne vjeruju čeka patnja teška, a one koji vjeruju i dobra djela čine - oprost i nagrada velika.
null.verse 35:8: Kako mogu biti isti: onaj kome su njegova ružna djela prikazana lijepim, a i on ih smatra lijepim.
null.verse 35:9: Allah šalje vjetrove koji pokreću oblake, a Mi ih onda u mrtve predjele upravljamo i njima zemlju oživljavamo, koja je mrtva bila; takvo će biti i oživljenje.
null.verse 35:10: Ako neko želi veličinu - pa - u Allaha je sva veličina! K Njemu se dižu lijepe riječi, i dobro djelo On prima.
null.verse 35:11: Allah vas stvara od zemlje, zatim od kapi sjemena, i najzad vas čini muškarcima i ženama.
null.verse 35:12: Ni dva mora nisu jednaka: jedno je slatko i prijatno - voda mu se lahko pije, a drugo je slano i gorko; vi iz svakog jedete svježe meso i vadite nakit kojim se kitite; ti vidiš lađe kako po njemu sijeku vodu da stječete iz obilja njego
null.verse 35:13: On uvodi noć u dan i uvodi dan u noć, On je potčinio Sunce i Mjesec - svako plovi do roka određenog; to vam je, eto, Allah.
null.verse 35:14: Ako im se molite, ne čuju vašu molbu, a da i čuju, ne bi vam se odazvali; na Sudnjem danu će poreći da ste ih Njemu ravnim smatrali.
null.verse 35:15: O ljudi, vi ste siromasi, vi trebate Allaha, a Allah je nezavisan i hvale dostojan.
null.verse 35:16: Ako hoće, ukloniće vas i nova stvorenja dovesti,
null.verse 35:17: to Allahu nije teško.
null.verse 35:18: I nijedan grješnik neće grijehove drugog nositi; ako grijehovima pretovareni pozove da mu se ponesu, niko mu ih neće ponijeti, pa ni rođak.
null.verse 35:19: Nisu nikako isti slijepac i onaj koji vidi,
null.verse 35:21: ni hladovina i vjetar vrući,
null.verse 35:22: i nisu nikako isti živi i mrtvi.
null.verse 35:23: tvoje je samo da opominješ.
null.verse 35:24: Mi smo te poslali s Istinom da radosne vijesti donosiš i da opominješ; a nije bilo naroda kome nije došao onaj koji ga je opominjao.
null.verse 35:25: Ako te oni u laž utjeruju - pa, i oni prije njih su poslanike u laž utjerivali, a oni su im očigledna čuda donosili, i listove, i Knjigu svjetilju.
null.verse 35:26: I Ja sam onda kažnjavao one koji nisu vjerovali, a kakva je samo bila kazna Moja!
null.verse 35:27: Zar ne znaš da Allah s neba pušta vodu i da Mi pomoću nje stvaramo plodove različitih vrsta; a postoje brda bijelih i crvenih staza, različitih boja, i sasvim crnih.
null.verse 35:28: I ljudi i životinja i stoke ima, isto tako, različitih vrsta.
null.verse 35:29: Oni koji Allahovu Knjigu čitaju i molitvu obavljaju i od onoga čime ih Mi opskrbljujemo udjeljuju, i tajno i javno, mogu se nadati nagradi koja neće nestati
null.verse 35:30: da ih On prema onome što su radili nagradi i još im iz obilja Svoga da, jer On mnogo prašta i blagodaran je.
null.verse 35:31: A ono što iz Knjige objavljujemo sušta je istina, ona potvrđuje da su istinite i one prije nje.
null.verse 35:32: Mi ćemo učiniti da Knjigu poslije naslijede oni Naši robovi koje Mi izaberemo; biće onih koji će se prema sebi ogriješiti, biće onih čija će dobra i loša djela podjednako teška biti, i biće i oni
null.verse 35:33: edenske perivoje u koje će ući, u kojima će se zlatnim narukvicama, biserom ukrašenim, kititi, a haljine će im, u njima, od svile biti.
null.verse 35:34: Hvaljen neka je Allah - govoriće - "koji je od nas tugu odstranio - Gospodar naš, zaista, mnogo prašta i blagodaran je -
null.verse 35:35: koji nam je, od dobrote Svoje, vječno boravište darovao, gdje nas umor neće doticati i u kome nas klonulost neće snalaziti.
null.verse 35:36: A nevjernike čeka vatra džehennemska, oni neće biti na smrt osuđeni, i neće umrijeti, i neće im se patnja u njemu ublažiti - eto tako ćemo svakog nevjernika kazniti -
null.verse 35:37: oni će u njemu jaukati: "Gospodaru naš, izbavi nas, činićemo dobra djela, drugačija od onih koja smo činili.
null.verse 35:38: Allah sigurno zna tajne nebesa i Zemlje; On dobro zna svačije misli.
null.verse 35:39: On čini da se smjenjujete na Zemlji; ko ne bude vjerovao, nevjerovanje njegovo je na njegovu štetu; nevjernicima će njihovo nevjerovanje kod Gospodara njihova samo povećati odvratnost, i nevjernicima će njihovo nevjerovanje pove&#
null.verse 35:40: Reci: "Kažite vi meni koji su dio Zemlje stvorila božanstva vaša kojima se, umjesto Allahu, klanjate, i recite mi imaju li oni u stvaranju nebesa ikakva udjela, ili smo mnogobošcima Mi dali Knjigu, pa imaju u njoj dokaz za to? Nijedno,
null.verse 35:41: Allah brani da se ravnoteža nebesa i Zemlje poremeti.
null.verse 35:42: Oni su se zaklinjali Allahom, najtežom zakletvom, da će se, bolje nego bilo koji narod, držati Pravoga puta - samo ako im dođe onaj koji će ih opominjati.
null.verse 35:43: oholost na Zemlji i ružno spletkarenje - a spletke će pogoditi upravo one koji se njima služe.
null.verse 35:44: Zašto oni ne putuju po svijetu da vide kako su završili oni prije njih, koji su bili jači od njih? - Allahu ne može ništa umaći ni na nebesima ni na Zemlji; On, uistinu, sve zna i sve može.
null.verse 35:45: Da Allah kažnjava ljude prema onome što zasluže, ništa živo na površini Zemljinoj ne bi ostavio; ali, On ih ostavlja do roka određenog, i kad im rok dođe - pa Allah dobro zna robove Svoje.

null.verse 35:1: সমস্ত প্রশংসা আল্লাহর, যিনি আসমান ও যমীনের স্রষ্টা এবং ফেরেশতাগণকে করেছেন বার্তাবাহক-তারা দুই দুই, তিন তিন ও চার চার পাখাবিশিষ্ট। তিনি সৃষ্টি মধ্যে যা ইচ্ছা যোগ করেন। নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ সর্ববিষয়ে সক্ষম।
null.verse 35:2: আল্লাহ মানুষের জন্য অনুগ্রহের মধ্য থেকে যা খুলে দেন, তা ফেরাবার কেউ নেই এবং তিনি যা বারণ করেন, তা কেউ প্রেরণ করতে পারে না তিনি ব্যতিত। তিনি পরাক্রমশালী প্রজ্ঞাময়।
null.verse 35:3: হে মানুষ, তোমাদের প্রতি আল্লাহর অনুগ্রহ স্মরণ কর। আল্লাহ ব্যতীত এমন কোন স্রষ্টা আছে কি, যে তোমাদেরকে আসমান ও যমীন থেকে রিযিক দান করে? তিনি ব্যতীত কোন উপাস্য নেই। অতএব তোমরা কোথায় ফিরে যাচ্ছ?
null.verse 35:4: তারা যদি আপনাকে মিথ্যাবাদী বলে, তবে আপনার পূর্ববর্তী পয়গম্বরগণকেও তো মিথ্যাবাদী বলা হয়েছিল। আল্লাহর প্রতিই যাবতীয় বিষয় প্রত্যাবর্তিত হয়।
null.verse 35:5: হে মানুষ, নিশ্চয় আল্লাহর ওয়াদা সত্য। সুতরাং, পার্থিব জীবন যেন তোমাদেরকে প্রতারণা না করে। এবং সেই প্রবঞ্চক যেন কিছুতেই তোমাদেরকে আল্লাহ সম্পর্কে প্রবঞ্চিত না করে।
null.verse 35:6: শয়তান তোমাদের শত্রু; অতএব তাকে শত্রু রূপেই গ্রহণ কর। সে তার দলবলকে আহবান করে যেন তারা জাহান্নামী হয়।
null.verse 35:7: যারা কুফর করে তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে কঠোর আযাব। আর যারা ঈমান আনে ও সৎকর্ম করে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে ক্ষমা ও মহা পুরস্কার।
null.verse 35:8: যাকে মন্দকর্ম শোভনীয় করে দেখানো হয়, সে তাকে উত্তম মনে করে, সে কি সমান যে মন্দকে মন্দ মনে করে। নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ যাকে ইচ্ছা পথভ্রষ্ট করেন এবং যাকে ইচছা সৎপথ প্রদর্শন করেন। সুতরাং আপনি তাদের জন্যে অনুতাপ করে নিজেকে ধ্বংস করবেন না। নিশ্চয়ই আল্লাহ জানেন তারা যা করে।
null.verse 35:9: আল্লাহই বায়ু প্রেরণ করেন, অতঃপর সে বায়ু মেঘমালা সঞ্চারিত করে। অতঃপর আমি তা মৃত ভূ-খন্ডের দিকে পরিচালিত করি, অতঃপর তদ্বারা সে ভূ-খন্ডকে তার মৃত্যুর পর সঞ্জীবিত করে দেই। এমনিভাবে হবে পুনরুত্থান।
null.verse 35:10: কেউ সম্মান চাইলে জেনে রাখুন, সমস্ত সম্মান আল্লাহরই জন্যে। তাঁরই দিকে আরোহণ করে সৎবাক্য এবং সৎকর্ম তাকে তুলে নেয়। যারা মন্দ কার্যের চক্রান্তে লেগে থাকে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে কঠোর শাস্তি। তাদের চক্রান্ত ব্যর্থ হবে।
null.verse 35:11: আল্লাহ তোমাদেরকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন মাটি থেকে, অতঃপর বীর্য থেকে, তারপর করেছেন তোমাদেরকে যুগল। কোন নারী গর্ভধারণ করে না এবং সন্তান প্রসব করে না; কিন্তু তাঁর জ্ঞাতসারে। কোন বয়স্ক ব্যক্তি বয়স পায় না। এবং তার বয়স হ্রাস পায় না; কিন্তু তা লিখিত আছে কিতাবে। নিশ্চয় এটা আল্লাহর পক্ষে সহজ।
null.verse 35:12: দু’টি সমুদ্র সমান হয় না-একটি মিঠা ও তৃষ্ণানিবারক এবং অপরটি লোনা। ঊভয়টি থেকেই তোমরা তাজা গোশত (মৎস) আহার কর এবং পরিধানে ব্যবহার্য গয়নাগাটি আহরণ কর। তুমি তাতে তার বুক চিরে জাহাজ চলতে দেখ, যাতে তোমরা তার অনুগ্রহ অন্বেষণ কর এবং যাতে তোমরা কৃতজ্ঞতা প্রকাশ কর।
null.verse 35:13: তিনি রাত্রিকে দিবসে প্রবিষ্ট করেন এবং দিবসকে রাত্রিতে প্রবিষ্ট করেন। তিনি সূর্য ও চন্দ্রকে কাজে নিয়োজিত করেছেন। প্রত্যেকটি আবর্তন করে এক নির্দিষ্ট মেয়াদ পর্যন্ত। ইনি আল্লাহ; তোমাদের পালনকর্তা, সাম্রাজ্য তাঁরই। তাঁর পরিবর্তে তোমরা যাদেরকে ডাক, তারা তুচ্ছ খেজুর আঁটিরও অধিকারী নয়।
null.verse 35:14: তোমরা তাদেরকে ডাকলে তারা তোমাদের সে ডাক শুনে না। শুনলেও তোমাদের ডাকে সাড়া দেয় না। কেয়ামতের দিন তারা তোমাদের শেরক অস্বীকার করবে। বস্তুতঃ আল্লাহর ন্যায় তোমাকে কেউ অবহিত করতে পারবে না।
null.verse 35:15: হে মানুষ, তোমরা আল্লাহর গলগ্রহ। আর আল্লাহ; তিনি অভাবমুক্ত, প্রশংসিত।
null.verse 35:16: তিনি ইচ্ছা করলে তোমাদেরকে বিলুপ্ত করে এক নতুন সৃষ্টির উদ্ভব করবেন।
null.verse 35:17: এটা আল্লাহর পক্ষে কঠিন নয়।
null.verse 35:18: কেউ অপরের বোঝা বহন করবে না। কেউ যদি তার গুরুতর ভার বহন করতে অন্যকে আহবান করে কেউ তা বহন করবে না-যদি সে নিকটবর্তী আত্নীয়ও হয়। আপনি কেবল তাদেরকে সতর্ক করেন, যারা তাদের পালনকর্তাকে না দেখেও ভয় করে এবং নামায কায়েম করে। যে কেউ নিজের সংশোধন করে, সে সংশোধন করে, স্বীয় কল্যাণের জন্যেই আল্লাহর নিকটই সকলের প্রত্যাবর্তন।
null.verse 35:19: দৃষ্টিমান ও দৃষ্টিহীন সমান নয়।
null.verse 35:21: সমান নয় ছায়া ও তপ্তরোদ।
null.verse 35:22: আরও সমান নয় জীবিত ও মৃত। আল্লাহ শ্রবণ করান যাকে ইচ্ছা। আপনি কবরে শায়িতদেরকে শুনাতে সক্ষম নন।
null.verse 35:23: আপনি তো কেবল একজন সতর্ককারী।
null.verse 35:24: আমি আপনাকে সত্যধর্মসহ পাঠিয়েছি সংবাদদাতা ও সতর্ককারীরূপে। এমন কোন সম্প্রদায় নেই যাতে সতর্ককারী আসেনি।
null.verse 35:25: তারা যদি আপনার প্রতি মিথ্যারোপ করে, তাদের পূর্ববর্তীরাও মিথ্যারোপ করেছিল। তাদের কাছে তাদের রসূলগণ স্পষ্ট নিদর্শন, সহীফা এবং উজ্জল কিতাবসহ এসেছিলেন।
null.verse 35:26: অতঃপর আমি কাফেরদেরকে ধৃত করেছিলাম। কেমন ছিল আমার আযাব!
null.verse 35:27: তুমি কি দেখনি আল্লাহ আকাশ থেকে বৃষ্টিবর্ষণ করেন, অতঃপর তদ্দ্বারা আমি বিভিন্ন বর্ণের ফল-মূল উদগত করি। পর্বতসমূহের মধ্যে রয়েছে বিভিন্ন বর্ণের গিরিপথ-সাদা, লাল ও নিকষ কালো কৃষ্ণ।
null.verse 35:28: অনুরূপ ভাবে বিভিন্ন বর্ণের মানুষ, জন্তু, চতুস্পদ প্রাণী রয়েছে। আল্লাহর বান্দাদের মধ্যে জ্ঞানীরাই কেবল তাঁকে ভয় করে। নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ পরাক্রমশালী ক্ষমাময়।
null.verse 35:29: যারা আল্লাহর কিতাব পাঠ করে, নামায কায়েম করে, এবং আমি যা দিয়েছি, তা থেকে গোপনে ও প্রকাশ্যে ব্যয় করে, তারা এমন ব্যবসা আশা কর, যাতে কখনও লোকসান হবে না।
null.verse 35:30: পরিণামে তাদেরকে আল্লাহ তাদের সওয়াব পুরোপুরি দেবেন এবং নিজ অনুগ্রহে আরও বেশী দেবেন। নিশ্চয় তিনি ক্ষমাশীল, গুণগ্রাহী।
null.verse 35:31: আমি আপনার প্রতি যে কিতাব প্রত্যাদেশ করেছি, তা সত্য-পূর্ববর্তী কিতাবের সত্যায়ন কারী নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ তাঁর বান্দাদের ব্যাপারে সব জানেন, দেখেন।
null.verse 35:32: অতঃপর আমি কিতাবের অধিকারী করেছি তাদেরকে যাদেরকে আমি আমার বান্দাদের মধ্য থেকে মনোনীত করেছি। তাদের কেউ কেউ নিজের প্রতি অত্যাচারী, কেউ মধ্যপন্থা অবলম্বনকারী এবং তাদের মধ্যে কেউ কেউ আল্লাহর নির্দেশক্রমে কল্যাণের পথে এগিয়ে গেছে। এটাই মহা অনুগ্রহ।
null.verse 35:33: তারা প্রবেশ করবে বসবাসের জান্নাতে। তথায় তারা স্বর্ণনির্মিত, মোতি খচিত কংকন দ্বারা অলংকৃত হবে। সেখানে তাদের পোশাক হবে রেশমের।
null.verse 35:34: আর তারা বলবে-সমস্ত প্রশংসা আল্লাহর, যিনি আমাদের দূঃখ দূর করেছেন। নিশ্চয় আমাদের পালনকর্তা ক্ষমাশীল, গুণগ্রাহী।
null.verse 35:35: যিনি স্বীয় অনুগ্রহে আমাদেরকে বসবাসের গৃহে স্থান দিয়েছেন, তথায় কষ্ট আমাদেরকে স্পর্শ করে না এবং স্পর্শ করে না ক্লান্তি।
null.verse 35:36: আর যারা কাফের হয়েছে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে জাহান্নামের আগুন। তাদেরকে মৃত্যুর আদেশও দেয়া হবে না যে, তারা মরে যাবে এবং তাদের থেকে তার শাস্তিও লাঘব করা হবে না। আমি প্রত্যেক অকৃতজ্ঞকে এভাবেই শাস্তি দিয়ে থাকি।
null.verse 35:37: সেখানে তারা আর্ত চিৎকার করে বলবে, হে আমাদের পালনকর্তা, বের করুন আমাদেরকে, আমরা সৎকাজ করব, পূর্বে যা করতাম, তা করব না। (আল্লাহ বলবেন) আমি কি তোমাদেরকে এতটা বয়স দেইনি, যাতে যা চিন্তা করার বিষয় চিন্তা করতে পারতে? উপরন্তু তোমাদের কাছে সতর্ককারীও আগমন করেছিল। অতএব আস্বাদন কর। জালেমদের জন্যে কোন সাহায্যকারী নেই।
null.verse 35:38: আল্লাহ আসমান ও যমীনের অদৃশ্য বিষয় সম্পর্কে জ্ঞাত। তিনি অন্তরের বিষয় সম্পর্কেও সবিশেষ অবহিত।
null.verse 35:39: তিনিই তোমাদেরকে পৃথিবীতে স্বীয় প্রতিনিধি করেছেন। অতএব যে কুফরী করবে তার কুফরী তার উপরই বর্তাবে। কাফেরদের কুফর কেবল তাদের পালনকর্তার ক্রোধই বৃদ্ধি করে এবং কাফেরদের কুফর কেবল তাদের ক্ষতিই বৃদ্ধি করে।
null.verse 35:40: বলুন, তোমরা কি তোমাদের সে শরীকদের কথা ভেবে দেখেছ, যাদেরকে আল্লাহর পরিবর্তে তোমরা ডাক? তারা পৃথিবীতে কিছু সৃষ্টি করে থাকলে আমাকে দেখাও। না আসমান সৃষ্টিতে তাদের কোন অংশ আছে, না আমি তাদেরকে কোন কিতাব দিয়েছি যে, তারা তার দলীলের উপর কায়েম রয়েছে, বরং জালেমরা একে অপরকে কেবল প্রতারণামূলক ওয়াদা দিয়ে থাকে।
null.verse 35:41: নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ আসমান ও যমীনকে স্থির রাখেন, যাতে টলে না যায়। যদি এগুলো টলে যায় তবে তিনি ব্যতীত কে এগুলোকে স্থির রাখবে? তিনি সহনশীল, ক্ষমাশীল।
null.verse 35:42: তারা জোর শপথ করে বলত, তাদের কাছে কোন সতর্ককারী আগমন করলে তারা অন্য যে কোন সম্প্রদায় অপেক্ষা অধিকতর সৎপথে চলবে। অতঃপর যখন তাদের কাছে সতর্ককারী আগমন করল, তখন তাদের ঘৃণাই কেবল বেড়ে গেল।
null.verse 35:43: পৃথিবীতে ঔদ্ধত্যের কারণে এবং কুচক্রের কারণে। কুচক্র কুচক্রীদেরকেই ঘিরে ধরে। তারা কেবল পূর্ববর্তীদের দশারই অপেক্ষা করছে। অতএব আপনি আল্লাহর বিধানে পরিবর্তন পাবেন না এবং আল্লাহর রীতি-নীতিতে কোন রকম বিচ্যুতিও পাবেন না।
null.verse 35:44: তারা কি পৃথিবীতে ভ্রমণ করে না? করলে দেখত তাদের পূর্ববর্তীদের কি পরিণাম হয়েছে। অথচ তারা তাদের অপেক্ষা অধিকতর শক্তিশালী ছিল। আকাশ ও পৃথিবীতে কোন কিছুই আল্লাহকে অপারগ করতে পারে না। নিশ্চয় তিনি সর্বজ্ঞ সর্বশক্তিমান।
null.verse 35:45: যদি আল্লাহ মানুষকে তাদের কৃতকর্মের কারণে পাকড়াও করতেন, তবে ভুপৃষ্ঠে চলমানকাউকে ছেড়ে দিতেন না। কিন্তু তিনি এক নির্দিষ্ট মেয়াদ পর্যন্ত তাদেরকে অবকাশ দেন। অতঃপর যখন সে নির্দিষ্ট মেয়াদ এসে যাবে তখন আল্লাহর সব বান্দা তাঁর দৃষ্টিতে থাকবে। সর্বশক্তিমান।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:1: Слава на Аллах, Твореца на небесата и на земята, Който стори ангелите пратеници с по две, по три, по четири крила! Той надбавя в творението, каквото пожелае.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:2: Никой не ще възпре милостта на Аллах, ако Той реши да я дари на хората, и каквото Той задържи, никой после не може да го пусне.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:3: О, хора, помнете благодатта на Аллах към вас! Има ли друг творец освен Аллах, който да ви дава препитание и от небето, и от земята? Няма друг бог освен Него! Как тогава бивате подлъгвани?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:4: И ако теб [о, Мухаммад] взимат за лъжец, то и други пратеници преди теб бяха взимани за лъжци.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:5: О, хора, обещанието на Аллах е истинно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:7: За неверниците има сурово мъчение, а за тези, които вярват и вършат праведни дела, има опрощение и голяма награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:8: А нима [получават същото] онези, на които са разкрасени лошите им деяния и им се струват хубави? Аллах оставя в заблуда когото пожелае и напътва когото пожелае.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:9: Аллах е, Който праща ветровете и те понасят облаци, и ги насочваме Ние към мъртва земя, и съживяваме с тях земята след нейната смърт.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:10: Който търси мощта - на Аллах принадлежи цялата мощ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:11: Аллах ви сътвори от пръст, после от частица сперма, после ви стори съпрузи.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:12: И не са еднакви двете води [на реките и на моретата] - едната е сладка, утолява жаждата, приятна е за пиене, а другата е солена, горчива, и от всяка ядете прясно месо, и [от солената] извличате украшения, които носите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:13: Той въвежда нощта в деня и въвежда деня в нощта, и Той подчини слънцето и луната - всяко да се движи до определен срок.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:14: Призовете ли ги, те не чуват вашия зов, а дори да са чули, не ви откликват.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:15: О, хора, вие сте нуждаещите се от Аллах, а Аллах е Пребогатия, Всеславния.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:16: Ако пожелае, Той ще ви погуби и ще ви замени с ново творение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:17: Това за Аллах не е трудно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:18: Никой съгрешил не ще носи греха на друг.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:19: Не са равни слепият и зрящият,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:22: И не са равни живите и мъртвите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:24: Ние те изпратихме с истината като благовестител и предупредител.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:25: И ако теб [о, Мухаммад] взимат за лъжец, то и онези преди тях взимаха за лъжци техните пратеници, които им донасяха ясните знаци, писанията и озаряващото Писание.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:26: После Аз сграбчвах онези, които не повярваха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:27: Нима не виждаш, че Аллах изсипва вода от небето! Чрез нея вадим плодове с различни цветове и
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:28: сред планините пътища: бели и червени, с различни цветове, и гарвановочерни.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:30: също хората, животните и добитъка с различни цветове.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:31: Онези, които четат Книгата на Аллах и отслужват молитвата, и дават скрито и явно от онова, което им дарихме, наистина се надяват на търговия, която не ще пропадне,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:32: защото Той ще им изплати напълно техните награди и ще им надбави от Своята благодат.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:33: Книгата, която Ние ти разкрихме, тя е истината, потвърждаваща онези ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:35: После оставихме Книгата в наследство на онези, които Ние избрахме сред Нашите раби.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:36: В градините на Адн ще влязат с украшения - гривни от злато и бисери, и дрехата им там ще е коприна.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:37: И ще кажат: Слава на Аллах, Който премахна от нас скръбта! Нашият Господ е опрощаващ, признателен.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:38: Със своята благодат Той ни настани в Дома на вечното пребивание.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:39: А за неверниците е Огънят на Ада.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:40: И ще крещят там за помощ: Господи наш, изведи ни, за да правим добро, а не онова, което сме правили! А нима не ви дадохме достатъчно дълъг живот, за да се поучи през него, който иска да се поучи! И предупредителят дойде при вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:42: Аллах знае неведомото на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:43: Той е, Който ви стори наместници на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:44: Кажи: Виждате ли онези, които съдружавате и зовете вместо Аллах? Посочете ми какво са сътворили на земята! Или имат дял на небесата? Или им дадохме писание, та от него имат ясен довод? Не, угнетителите си обещават един другиму само измама.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:45: Аллах държи небесата и земята да не се разрушат, а ако се рушат, никой не може да ги държи освен Него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:46: И се вричаха в Аллах с най-усърдните си клетви, че ако дойде при тях предупредител, непременно ще следват неговото напътствие повече от всяка друга общност.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:47: от надменност на земята и лукавство в злината.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:48: И не ходят ли по земята, за да видят какъв бе краят на онези преди тях? А те бяха по-силни от тях.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 35:49: И ако Аллах наказваше хората за онова, което са заслужили, Той не би оставил на земята дори една твар.

null.verse 35:1: 一切讚頌，全歸真主——天地的創造者！他使每個天神具有兩翼，或三翼，或四翼。他在創造中增加他所欲增加的。真主對於萬事確是全能的。
null.verse 35:2: 無論真主賞賜你們甚麼恩惠，絕無人能加以阻攔；無論他扣留甚麼恩惠，在禁施之後，絕無人能加以開釋。他確是萬能的，確是至睿的。
null.verse 35:3: 人們啊！你們應當銘記真主所賜你們的恩惠，除真主外，還有甚麼創造者能從天上地下供給你們嗎？除他外，絕無應受崇拜的，你們怎麼如此悖謬呢？
null.verse 35:4: 如果他們否認你，那末，在你之前的使者們，已被否認了。萬事只歸真主。
null.verse 35:5: 人們啊！真主的應許，確是真實的，所以絕不要讓今世的生活欺騙你們，絕不要讓猾賊以真主的優容欺騙你們。
null.verse 35:6: 惡魔確是你們的仇敵，所以你們應當認他為仇敵。他只號召他的黨羽，以便他們做烈火的居民。
null.verse 35:7: 不信道者，將受嚴厲的刑罰；信道而且行善者，將蒙赦宥和重大的報酬。
null.verse 35:8: 為自己的惡行所迷惑，因而認惡為善者，像真主所引導的人嗎？真主必使他所意欲者誤入迷途，必使他所意欲者遵循正道，所以你不要為哀悼他們而喪生，真主確是全知他們的行為的。
null.verse 35:9: 真主使風去興起雲來，然後，把雲趕至一個已死的地方，而借它使已死的大地復活。死人的復活就是這樣的。
null.verse 35:10: 欲得光榮者，須知光榮全歸真主。良言將為他所知，他升起善行。圖謀不軌者，將受嚴厲的刑罰；這些人的圖謀，是不能得逞的。
null.verse 35:11: 真主創造你們，先用泥土，繼用精液，然後，使你們成為配偶。任何女人的懷孕和分娩，無一件不是他所知道的；增加長命者的壽數，減少短命者的年齡，無一件不記錄在天經中；那對真主確是容易的。
null.verse 35:12: 兩海不一樣，這海是很甜的、可口的淡水，那海是很苦的鹹水。你們可吃每一海中所產的新鮮的肉，又可採你們所戴的首飾。你看船舶在海上破浪而行，以便你們尋求他的恩惠，以便你們感謝他。
null.verse 35:13: 他使黑夜侵入白晝，使白晝侵入黑夜；他制服日月，各自運行至一定期。這是真主——你們的主，國土只是他的，你們捨他而祈禱的，不能管理一絲毫。
null.verse 35:14: 如果你們祈禱他們，他們聽不見你們的祈禱；即便聽見了，他們也不能答應你們；復活日，他們將否認你們曾以他們配真主。任何人不能像徹知者那樣告訴你。
null.verse 35:15: 人們啊！你們才是需求真主的，真主確是無求的，確是可頌的。
null.verse 35:16: 如果他意欲，他將毀滅你們，而創造新的眾生。
null.verse 35:17: 那對真主不是煩難的。
null.verse 35:18: 一個負罪者，不再負別人的罪；一個負重罪者，如果叫別人來替他負罪，那末，別人雖是他的近親，也不能替他擔負一絲毫。你只能警告在秘密中敬畏主，且謹守拜功者。洗滌身心者，只為自己而洗滌。真主是唯一的歸宿。
null.verse 35:19: 盲人和非盲人不相等，
null.verse 35:21: 背陰和當陽也不相等，
null.verse 35:22: 活人和死人也不相等。真主必使他所意欲者能聽聞，你絕不能使在墳中的人能聽聞，
null.verse 35:23: 你只是一個警告者。
null.verse 35:24: 我確已使你本真理而為報喜者和警告者。沒有一個民族則已，只要有一個民族，其中就有警告者曾經逝去了。
null.verse 35:25: 如果他們否認你，那末，在他們之前逝去者，已否認了；他們族中的使者曾昭示他們明証、天經和燦爛的經典。
null.verse 35:26: 然後，我懲罰了不信道者，我的譴責是怎樣的？
null.verse 35:27: 難道你還不知道嗎？真主從雲中降下雨水，然後借雨水而生產各種果實。山上有白的、紅的、各色的條紋，和漆黑的岩石。
null.verse 35:28: 人類，野獸和牲畜中，也同樣地有不同的種類。真主的僕人中，只有學者敬畏他。真主確是萬能的，確是至赦的。
null.verse 35:29: 誦讀真主的經典，且謹守拜功，並秘密地或公開地分捨我所賜予他們的財物者，他們希望這經營不破產，
null.verse 35:30: 以便他使他們享受自己的完全的報酬，並把他的恩惠加賜他們；他確是至赦的，確是善報的。
null.verse 35:31: 我所啟示你的，確是真理，足証以前的經典是真實的。真主對於他的僕人們確是徹知的，確最明察的。
null.verse 35:32: 然後，我使我所揀選的僕人們繼承經典；他們中有自欺的，有中和的，有奉真主的命令而爭先行善的。那確是宏恩。
null.verse 35:33: 常住的樂園，他們將入其中，他們在裡面，戴的是金鐲和珍珠，穿的是絲綢。
null.verse 35:34: 他們說：「一切讚頌，全歸真主！他祛除我們的憂愁。我們的主，確是至赦的，確是善報的。
null.verse 35:35: 他使我們居住在常住的房屋中，那是出於他的恩惠。我們在裡面，毫不辛苦，毫不疲倦。」
null.verse 35:36: 不信道者，將遭火獄的火刑，既不判他們死刑，讓他們死亡；又不減輕他們所遭的火刑。我這樣報酬一切忘恩的人們。
null.verse 35:37: 他們在裡面求救說：「我們的主啊！求你放我們出去，我們將改過遷善。」難道我沒有延長你們的壽數，使能覺悟者有覺悟的時間嗎？警告者已降臨你們了。你們嘗試刑罰吧，不義者絕沒有任何援助者。
null.verse 35:38: 真主確是全知大地的幽玄的，他確是全知心事的。
null.verse 35:39: 他使你們為大地上的代治者。不信道者自受其不信的報酬；不信道者的不信，只使他們在他們的主那裡受痛恨；不信道者的不信，只使他們更蒙虧折。
null.verse 35:40: 你說：「你們告訴我吧，你們捨真主而祈禱的那些配主，怎麼應受崇拜呢？你們告訴我吧！他們曾獨自創造了大地的哪一部分呢？還是他們曾與真主共同創造諸天呢？還是真主曾授予他們一本經典，而他們是依據那本經典中的許多明証呢？」不然，不義者僅以欺騙互相應許。
null.verse 35:41: 真主的確維持天地，以免毀滅；如果天地要毀滅，則除真主外，任何人不能維持它。他確是至容的，確是至赦的。
null.verse 35:42: 他們指真主而發出最嚴重的誓言說：「如果有一個警告者來臨我們，那末，我們遵循正道必甚過任何一個民族。」當警告者來臨他們的時候，他們卻更加悖謬，
null.verse 35:43: 在地方上更加自大，更加圖謀不軌。陰謀只困其創作者，他們除了等待古人所遭受的常道外，還能等待甚麼呢？對於真主的常道，你絕不能發現任何變更；對於真主的常道，你絕不能發現任何變遷。
null.verse 35:44: 道他們沒有在大地上旅行，以觀察前人的結局是怎樣的嗎？前人比他們勢力更大。真主是天地間任何物不能使他無奈的，他確是全知的，確是全能的。
null.verse 35:45: 假若真主為世人所犯的罪惡而懲治他們，那末，他不留一個人在地面上；但他讓他們延遲到一個定期，當他們的定期來臨的時候，（他將依他們的行為而報酬他們），因為真主確是明察他的眾僕的。 道他們沒有在大地上旅行，以觀察前人的結局是怎樣的嗎？前人比他們勢力更大。真主是天地間任何物不能使他無奈的，他確是全知的，確是全能的。

null.verse 35:1: Chvála Bohu, stvořiteli nebes a země, který učinil anděly vyslanci majícími dva, tři či čtyři páry křídel - a On přidává tvorstvu svému, cokoliv chce, a Bůh je všech věcí mocen.
null.verse 35:2: Cokoliv Bůh otevře lidem z milosti Své, to nikdo jim nemůže zadržet, však cokoliv On zadrží, to nikdo nemůže poslat kromě Něho.
null.verse 35:3: Lidé, pomněte dobrodiní Božího vůči vám! Je snad nějaký stvořitel kromě Boha, který uštědřuje vám obživu z nebes i ze země? A není božstva kromě Něho - jak mohli jste se tak odvrátit?
null.verse 35:4: Jestliže tě prohlašují za lháře, tedy již poslové před tebou byli za ně prohlašováni; a k Bohu budou věci všechny navráceny.
null.verse 35:5: Lidé, slib Boží je věru pravdivý, nechť vás tedy neoklame život pozemský a nechť vás neoklame o Bohu podvodník žádný.
null.verse 35:6: Satan je věru vaším nepřítelem, proto jej pokládejte i vy za nepřítele svého! On volá k sobě přívržence své jen proto, aby stali se obyvateli plamene šlehajícího.
null.verse 35:7: Pro ty, kdož neuvěřili, určen je trest přísný, zatímco ty, kdož uvěřili a zbožné skutky konali, čeká odpuštění odměna veliká.
null.verse 35:8: Zdaž ten, jemuž byly špatné skutky jeho okrášleny, takže je vidí jako dobré.
null.verse 35:9: Bůh je ten, jenž vysílá vítr, aby zdvihal mraky; a My je ženeme nad mrtvou oblast a oživujeme jimi zemi po smrti její.
null.verse 35:10: Kdo si přeje moci.
null.verse 35:11: Bůh vás stvořil z prachu, potom z kapky semene a posléze z vás učinil pohlaví dvojí.
null.verse 35:12: A nejsou si obě velké vody rovné: jedna je sladká, čerstvá a příjemná k pití, zatímco druhá je slaná a hořká; z obou pak pojídáte čerstvé maso a lovíte z nich ozdoby, jež nosíte.
null.verse 35:13: On dává vniknout noci do dne a dni do noci a podmanil si slunce a měsíc a obě tělesa se pohybují k lhůtě stanovené.
null.verse 35:14: Jestliže se k nim modlíte, oni neslyší vzývání vaše, a i kdyby je slyšeli, nemohli by vás vyslyšet.
null.verse 35:15: Lidé, vy chudáci jste na Boha odkázaní, zatímco On soběstačný je a chvályhodný.
null.verse 35:16: Kdyby chtěl, dal by vám zaniknout a nahradil by vás tvorstvem novým,
null.verse 35:17: a není to pro Boha ničím obtížným.
null.verse 35:18: Žádná duše hříchy obtížená neponese břemeno duše jiné; a bude-li pak obtížená duše prosit, aby jí bylo neseno břímě její, nebude jí z něho nic ubráno, i kdyby to byl příbuzný.
null.verse 35:19: Nelze srovnávat slepého a vidoucího,
null.verse 35:21: ani stín a horko!
null.verse 35:22: A nelze srovnávat živé a mrtvé.
null.verse 35:23: vždyť tys jen varovatelem.
null.verse 35:24: A poslali jsme tě s pravdou a jako hlasatele zvěsti radostné i jako varovatele; a není národa jediného, k němuž by nebyl přišel varovatel.
null.verse 35:25: Jestliže tě prohlašují za lháře, tedy již ti, co byli před nimi, prohlašovali posly své za lháře, i když přišli k nim s důkazy jasnými a Písmy i Knihou osvícenou.
null.verse 35:26: A potom jsem uchvátil ty, kdož nevěřili a jaká byla nevole Má?
null.verse 35:27: Což nevidíš, jak Bůh z nebe vodu sesílá, jejíž pomocí dáváme vyrůst plodům rozličných druhů? A na horách jsou pruhy bílé a červené a různobarevné i temně černé.
null.verse 35:28: A také mezi lidmi, zvířaty a dobytkem jsou druhy rozličné.
null.verse 35:29: Ti, kdož přednášejí Písmo Boží, dodržují modlitbu a dávají almužnu skrytě i veřejně z toho, co jsme jim uštědřili, ti mají naději na obchod, jenž nebude nevýnosný,
null.verse 35:30: aby On jim mohl dát v plnosti odměnu jejich a přidat jim k tomu z dobrodiní Svého.
null.verse 35:31: To, co jsme ti vnukli z Písma, je pravda potvrzující to, co již předtím bylo sesláno.
null.verse 35:32: Potom jsme učinili dědici Písma ty, jež jsme si vyvolili mezi služebníky Svými.
null.verse 35:33: v zahradách Edenu, do nichž vstoupí, budou ozdobeni náramky zlatými a perlami a jejich oděvy tam budou hedvábné.
null.verse 35:34: A budou říkat: "Chvála Boha, jenž od nás zármutek vzdálil! Pán náš věru je odpouštějící a za vděčnost uznalý,
null.verse 35:35: On je ten, který nás z milosti své ubytoval v příbytku trvalém, v němž nedotkne se nás námaha žádná a nedotkne se nás v něm ani únava.
null.verse 35:36: Pro ty, kdož neuvěřili, připraven je oheň pekelný a nebude jim souzeno, aby zemřeli, a nebude jim v něm trest jejich ulehčen a takto odměňujeme každého nevěřícího.
null.verse 35:37: A budou tam křičet: "Pane náš, vyveď nás odtud a my budeme dobré skutky konat, nikoliv to, co dříve jsme dělali!" "Což nedarovali jsme vám věk dlouhý, aby ten, kdo uvažuje, si to mohl uvážit? A nepřišel k vám varovatel? Okuste tedy trestu! A nespravedliví nebudou mít pomocníka žádného!
null.verse 35:38: Bůh dobře zná nepoznatelné na nebi i na zemi a On dobře ví, co hrudi skrývají.
null.verse 35:39: A jest to On, jenž učinil vás nástupci na zemi.
null.verse 35:40: Rci: "Viděli jste společníky své, jež vedle Boha vzýváte? Ukažte mi tedy, co stvořili na zemi či jaký mají podíl na nebi anebo zda dali jsme jim Písmo nějaké, aby opřít se mohli o jasný důkaz z něho?" Nikoliv, nespravedliví si vzájemně slibují jen klam!
null.verse 35:41: Bůh věru pevně třímá nebesa a zemi, aby se nesesuly; kdyby se sesuly, pak by je po Něm nikdo jiný nemohl udržet, a On soucitný je a odpouštějící.
null.verse 35:42: A přísahali při Bohu přísahami nejslavnostnějšími, že přijde-li k nim varovatel, věru se dají cestou správnější než kterýkoliv národ jiný.
null.verse 35:43: následkem pýchy jejich na zemi a úkladů zlovolných.
null.verse 35:44: Což necestovali po zemi a neviděli, jaký byl konec těch, kdo před nimi žili a kdo mocnější než oni silou byli? Není na nebesích ani na zemi ničeho, co oslabit by mohlo Boha, a On věru je vševědoucí a všemocný.
null.verse 35:45: Kdyby Bůh chtěl ztrestat lidi za to, co si vysloužili, nezůstala by na povrchu zemském žádná bytost živá, avšak On dává jim odklad do lhůty stanovené.

null.verse 35:1: Alle lof komt God toe, de Schepper der hemelen en der aarde, Die de engelen tot boodschappers maakt met twee, drie en vier vleugelen.
null.verse 35:2: Wat God de mens aan barmhartigheid schenkt, is door niemand tegen te houden; en wat Hij terug houdt, kan buiten Hem, niemand schenken; Hij is de Almachtige, de Alwijze.
null.verse 35:3: O mensen, herinnert u de gunst van God jegens u.
null.verse 35:4: En indien zij u verloochenen (bedenk dan) dat de boodschappers vóór u ook werden verloochend; maar tot God worden alle dingen teruggebracht.
null.verse 35:5: mensen, de belofte van God is voorzeker waarachtig.
null.verse 35:6: Voorwaar, Satan is een vijand van u, behandelt hem daarom als vijand.
null.verse 35:7: Er is een strenge straf voor hen die niet geloven.
null.verse 35:8: Hij wiens boze daden schoonschijnend zijn gemaakt, zodat hij deze als goed beschouwt (kan de leiding vinden).
null.verse 35:9: En het is God Die de winden zendt zodat zij wolken doen opstijgen, dan drijven Wij deze (de wolken) naar een verdord land en geven leven aan de aarde na haar dood.
null.verse 35:10: Wie eer wenst (wete), dat alle eer aan God behoort.
null.verse 35:11: God schiep u uit stof, dan uit een levenskiem, daarna maakte Hij u tot paren.
null.verse 35:12: De twee wateren zijn niet gelijk; het ene zoet, smakelijk en goed om te drinken, en het andere zout en bitter.
null.verse 35:13: Hij dompelt de nacht in de dag en de dag in de nacht.
null.verse 35:14: Als gij hen aanroept, zullen zij uw roep niet horen en indien zij uw roep horen, zullen zij u niet kunnen antwoorden.
null.verse 35:15: O, gij mensen, gij zijt afhankelijk van God, maar God is de Onafhankelijke, de Geprezene.
null.verse 35:16: Als Hij het wilde, zou Hij u kunnen wegnemen en een nieuwe schepping voortbrengen.
null.verse 35:17: Dat is voor God niet moeilijk.
null.verse 35:18: Geen lastdragende kan de last van een ander dragen en indien een zwaarbelaste (een ander) roept tot (verlichting van) zijn last, zal er niets van kunnen worden overgenomen, zelfs al is hij een bloedverwant; gij kunt slechts hen waarschuwen, die hun Heer in het verborgene vrezen en het gebed onderhouden.
null.verse 35:19: De blinde is niet gelijk aan de ziende;
null.verse 35:20: Noch is de duisternis gelijk aan het licht;
null.verse 35:21: Noch zijn de schaduw en de hitte gelijk;
null.verse 35:22: Noch zijn de levenden gelijk aan de doden.
null.verse 35:23: Gij (profeet) zijt slechts een waarschuwer.
null.verse 35:24: Voorwaar, Wij hebben u met de Waarheid gezonden als drager van blijde tijdingen en als waarschuwer; en er is geen volk waaronder zich geen boodschapper heeft bevonden.
null.verse 35:25: Indien dezen u verloochenen, verloochenden ook zij, die voor hen waren.
null.verse 35:26: Dan greep Ik de ongelovigen aan en hoe (vreselijk) was Mijn afkeuring!
null.verse 35:27: Hebt gij niet gezien, dat Wij water van de hemel nederzenden en dat Wij daardoor vruchten voortbrengen van verschillende kleuren (en soorten); en in de bergen zijn streken van wit en rood, van donker of ravenzwart en van nog verschillende tinten.
null.verse 35:28: Ook mensen, beesten, vee zijn van verschillende kleur.
null.verse 35:29: Waarlijk, zij die het Boek (de Koran) van God voordragen en het gebed naleven en heimelijk of openlijk geven van hetgeen Wij hun hebben geschonken, mogen hopen op een winst die nooit zal vergaan;
null.verse 35:30: Opdat Hij hun de volle beloning moge geven, er uit Zijn overvloed aan toevoegende.
null.verse 35:31: En hetgeen Wij u hebben geopenbaard van het Boek is de Waarheid, vervullend hetgeen voordien (geopenbaard) was.
null.verse 35:32: Dan gaven Wij het Boek als erfdeel aan diegenen Onzer dienaren die Wij uitkozen.
null.verse 35:33: In tuinen der eeuwigheid zullen zij binnengaan, zij zullen er in worden getooid met gouden armbanden en met paarlen; en hun kleding zal van zijde zijn.
null.verse 35:34: En zij zullen zeggen: "Alle lof zij God, Die droefheid van ons heeft weggenomen.
null.verse 35:35: "Hij, Die ons door Zijn genade deze verbligfplaats heeft toegewezen, waarin ons geen last, noch vermoeienis raakt.
null.verse 35:36: Maar voor de ongelovigen is het Vuur der hel.
null.verse 35:37: En zij zullen er in schreeuwen, zeggende: "Onze Heer, haal ons er uit, wij zullen goede werken doen, anders dan wij vroeger deden.
null.verse 35:38: Voorwaar, God kent de geheimen der hemelen en der aarde.
null.verse 35:39: Hij is het, Die u tot stedehouders op aarde heeft gemaakt.
null.verse 35:40: Zeg: "Licht (mij) in over de goden, die gij naast God aanroept- Toont mij aan hetgeen zij van de aarde hebben geschapen.
null.verse 35:41: Voorzeker, God houdt de hemelen en de aarde in stand opdat zij niet vergaan.
null.verse 35:42: Zij zweren bij God hun plechtigste eden, dat indien een waarschuwer tot hen zou komen, zij de leiding beter zouden volgen dan andere volkeren.
null.verse 35:43: Evenals in aanmatiging op aarde en in het smeden van boze plannen.
null.verse 35:44: Hebben zij niet op aarde gereisd en gezien hoe het einde was van degenen die vóór hen leefden? En dezen waren sterker in macht dan zij.
null.verse 35:45: En indien God de mensen zou straffen voor hetgeen zij doen, zou Hij geen schepsel op de oppervlakte ervan achterlaten; maar Hij schenkt hun uitstel tot een vastgestelde tijd; en wanneer die vastgestelde tijd komt: voorwaar God kent Zijn dienaren goed.
null.verse 35:46: Evenals het volk van Noach vóórdien; waarlijk zij waren uiterst onrechtvaardig en opstandig goed.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:1: Praise be to Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, Who appointeth the angels messengers having wings two, three and four.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:2: That which Allah openeth unto mankind of mercy none can withhold it; and that which He withholdeth none can release thereafter.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:3: O mankind! Remember Allah’s grace toward you! Is there any creator other than Allah who provideth for you from the sky and the earth ? There is no God save Him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:4: And if they deny thee, (O Muhammad), messengers (of Allah) were denied before thee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:5: O mankind! Lo! the promise of Allah is true.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:6: Lo! the devil is an enemy for you, so treat him as an enemy.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:7: Those who disbelieve, theirs will be an awful doom; and those who believe and do good works, theirs will be forgiveness and a great reward.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:8: Is he, the evil of whose deeds is made fairseeming unto him so that he deemeth it good, (other than Satan’s dupe) ? Allah verily sendeth whom He will astray, and guideth whom He will; so let not thy soul expire in sighings for them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:9: And Allah it is Who sendeth the winds and they raise a cloud; then We lead it unto a dead land and revive therewith the earth after its death.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:10: Whoso desireth power (should know that) all power belongeth to Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:11: Allah created you from dust, then from a little fluid, then He made you pairs (the male and female).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:12: And the two seas are not alike: this, fresh, sweet, good to drink, this (other) bitter, salt.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:13: He maketh the night to pass into the day and He maketh the day to pass into the night.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:14: If ye pray unto them they hear not your prayer, and if they heard they could not grant it you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:15: O mankind! Ye are the poor in your relation to Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:16: If He will, He can be rid of you and bring (instead of you) some new creation.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:17: That is not a hard thing for Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:18: And no burdened soul can bear another’s burden, and if one heavy laden crieth for (help with) his load, naught of it will be lifted even though he (unto whom he crieth) be of kin.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:19: The blind man is not equal with the seer;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:21: Nor is the shadow equal with the sun’s full heat;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:22: Nor are the living equal with the dead.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:24: Lo! We have sent thee with the Truth, a bearer of glad tidings and a warner; and there is not a nation but a warner hath passed among them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:25: And if they deny thee, those before them also denied.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:26: Then seized I those who disbelieved, and how intense was My abhorrence!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:27: Hast thou not seen that Allah causeth water to fall from the sky, and We produce therewith fruit of divers hues; and among the hills are streaks white and red, of divers hues, and (others) raven-black;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:28: And of men and beasts and cattle, in like manner, divers hues ? The erudite among His bondmen fear Allah alone.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:29: Lo! those who read the Scripture of Allah, and establish worship, and spend of that which We have bestowed on them secretly and openly, they look forward to imperishable gain,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:30: That He will pay them their wages and increase them of His grace.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:31: As for that which We inspire in thee of the Scripture, it is the Truth confirming that which was (revealed) before it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:32: Then We gave the Scripture as inheritance unto those whom We elected of Our bondmen.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:33: Gardens of Eden! They enter them wearing armlets of gold and pearl and their raiment therein is silk.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:34: And they say: Praise be to Allah Who hath put grief away from us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:35: Who, of His grace, hath installed us in the mansion of eternity, where toil toucheth us not nor can weariness affect us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:36: But as for those who disbelieve, for them is fire of hell; it taketh not complete effect upon them so that they can die, nor is its torment lightened for them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:37: And they cry for help there, (saying): Our Lord! Release us; we will do right, not (the wrong) that we used to do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:38: Lo! Allah is the Knower of the Unseen of the heavens and the earth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:39: He it is Who hath made you regents in the earth; so he who disbelieveth, his disbelief be on his own head.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:40: Say: Have ye seen your partner-gods to whom ye pray beside Allah ? Show me what they created of the earth! Or have they any portion in the heavens ? Or have We given them a scripture so they act on clear proof therefrom ? Nay, the evil-doers promise one another only to deceive.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:41: Lo! Allah graspeth the heavens and the earth that they deviate not, and if they were to deviate there is not one that could grasp them after Him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:42: And they swore by Allah, their most binding oath, that if a warner came unto them they would be more tractable than any of the nations; yet, when a warner came unto them it aroused in them naught save repugnance,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:43: (Shown in their) behaving arrogantly in the land and plotting evil; and the evil plot encloseth but the men who make it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:44: Have they not travelled in the land and seen the nature of the consequence for those who were before them, and they were mightier than these in power ? Allah is not such that aught in the heavens or in the earth escapeth Him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 35:45: If Allah took mankind to task by that which they deserve, He would not leave a living creature on the surface of the earth; but He reprieveth them unto an appointed term, and when their term cometh - then verily (they will know that) Allah is ever Seer of His slaves.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:1: Praise be to God, Who created (out of nothing) the heavens and the earth, Who made the angels, messengers with wings,- two, or three, or four (pairs): He adds to Creation as He pleases: for God has power over all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:2: What God out of his Mercy doth bestow on mankind there is none can withhold: what He doth withhold, there is none can grant, apart from Him: and He is the Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:3: O men! Call to mind the grace of God unto you! is there a creator, other than God, to give you sustenance from heaven or earth? There is no god but He: how then are ye deluded away from the Truth?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:4: And if they reject thee, so were apostles rejected before thee: to God back for decision all affairs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:5: O men! Certainly the promise of God is true.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:6: Verily Satan is an enemy to you: so treat him as an enemy.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:7: For those who reject God, is a terrible Penalty: but for those who believe and work righteous deeds, is Forgiveness, and a magnificent Reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:8: Is he, then, to whom the evil of his conduct is made alluring, so that he looks upon it as good, (equal to one who is rightly guided)? For God leaves to stray whom He wills, and guides whom He wills.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:9: It is God Who sends forth the Winds, so that they raise up the Clouds, and We drive them to a land that is dead, and revive the earth therewith after its death: even so (will be) the Resurrection!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:10: If any do seek for glory and power,- to God belong all glory and power.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:11: And God did create you from dust; then from a sperm-drop; then He made you in pairs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:12: Nor are the two bodies of flowing water alike,- the one palatable, sweet, and pleasant to drink, and the other, salt and bitter.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:13: He merges Night into Day, and he merges Day into Night, and he has subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law): each one runs its course for a term appointed.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:14: If ye invoke them, they will not listen to your call, and if they were to listen, they cannot answer your (prayer).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:15: O ye men! It is ye that have need of God: but God is the One Free of all wants, worthy of all praise.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:16: If He so pleased, He could blot you out and bring in a New Creation.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:17: Nor is that (at all) difficult for God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:18: Nor can a bearer of burdens bear another’s burdens if one heavily laden should call another to (bear) his load.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:19: The blind and the seeing are not alike;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:20: Nor are the depths of Darkness and the Light;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:21: Nor are the (chilly) shade and the (genial) heat of the sun:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:22: Nor are alike those that are living and those that are dead.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:23: Thou art no other than a warner.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:24: Verily We have sent thee in truth, as a bearer of glad tidings, and as a warner: and there never was a people, without a warner having lived among them (in the past).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:25: And if they reject thee, so did their predecessors, to whom came their apostles with Clear Signs, Books of dark prophecies, and the Book of Enlightenment.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:26: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith: and how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:27: Seest thou not that God sends down rain from the sky? With it We then bring out produce of various colours.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:28: And so amongst men and crawling creatures and cattle, are they of various colours.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:29: Those who rehearse the Book of God, establish regular Prayer, and spend (in Charity) out of what We have provided for them, secretly and openly, hope for a commerce that will never fail:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:30: For He will pay them their meed, nay, He will give them (even) more out of His Bounty: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Ready to appreciate (service).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:31: That which We have revealed to thee of the Book is the Truth,- confirming what was (revealed) before it: for God is assuredly- with respect to His Servants - well acquainted and Fully Observant.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:32: Then We have given the Book for inheritance to such of Our Servants as We have chosen: but there are among them some who wrong their own souls; some who follow a middle course; and some who are, by God’s leave, foremost in good deeds; that is the highest Grace.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:33: Gardens of Eternity will they enter: therein will they be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls; and their garments there will be of silk.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:34: And they will say: "Praise be to God, Who has removed from us (all) sorrow: for our Lord is indeed Oft-Forgiving Ready to appreciate (service):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:35: "Who has, out of His Bounty, settled us in a Home that will last: no toil nor sense of weariness shall touch us therein.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:36: But those who reject (God) - for them will be the Fire of Hell: No term shall be determined for them, so they should die, nor shall its Penalty be lightened for them.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:37: Therein will they cry aloud (for assistance): "Our Lord! Bring us out: we shall work righteousness, not the (deeds) we used to do!" - "Did We not give you long enough life so that he that would should receive admonition? and (moreover) the warner came to you.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:38: Verily God knows (all) the hidden things of the heavens and the earth: verily He has full knowledge of all that is in (men’s) hearts.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:39: He it is That has made you inheritors in the earth: if, then, any do reject (God), their rejection (works) against themselves: their rejection but adds to the odium for the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord: their rejection but adds to (their own) undoing.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:40: Say: "Have ye seen (these) ’Partners’ of yours whom ye call upon besides God? Show Me what it is they have created in the (wide) earth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:41: It is God Who sustains the heavens and the earth, lest they cease (to function): and if they should fail, there is none - not one - can sustain them thereafter: Verily He is Most Forbearing, Oft-Forgiving.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:42: They swore their strongest oaths by God that if a warner came to them, they would follow his guidance better than any (other) of the Peoples: But when a warner came to them, it has only increased their flight (from righteousness),-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:43: On account of their arrogance in the land and their plotting of Evil, but the plotting of Evil will hem in only the authors thereof.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:44: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the End of those before them,- though they were superior to them in strength? Nor is God to be frustrated by anything whatever in the heavens or on earth: for He is All-Knowing.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 35:45: If God were to punish men according to what they deserve.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:1: Praise belongs to God, Originator of the heavens and earth, who appointed the angels to be messengers having wings two, three and four, increasing creation as He wills.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:2: Whatsoever mercy God opens to men, none can withhold and whatsoever He withholds, none can loose after Him.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:3: O men, remember God’s blessing upon you; is there any creator, apart from God, who provides for you out of heaven and earth? There is no god but He: how then are you perverted?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:4: If they cry lies to thee, Messengers before thee were cried lies to; and unto God all matters are returned.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:5: O men, God’s promise is true; so let not the present life delude you, and let not the Deluder delude you concerning God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:6: Surely Satan is an enemy to you; so take him for an enemy.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:7: Those who disbelieve -- there awaits them a terrible chastisement; but those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness -- theirs shall be forgiveness and a great wage.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:8: And what of him, the evil of whose deeds has been decked out fair to him, so that he thinks it is good? God leads astray whomsoever He will, and whomsoever He will He guides; so let not thy soul be wasted in regrets for them; God has knowledge of the things they work.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:9: God is He that looses the winds, that stir up cloud, then We drive it to a dead land and therewith revive the earth, after it is dead.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:10: Whosoever desires glory, the glory altogether belongs to God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:11: God created you of dust then of a sperm-drop, then He made you pairs.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:12: Not equal are the two seas; this is sweet, grateful to taste, delicious to drink, and that is salt, bitter to the tongue.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:13: He makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night, and He has subjected the sun and the moon, each of them running to a stated term.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:14: If you call upon them, they will not hear your prayer, and if they heard, they would not answer you; and on the Day of Resurrection they will disown your partnership.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:15: O men, you are the ones that have need of God; He is the All-sufficient, the All-laudable.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:16: If He will, He can put you away and bring a new creation;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:17: that is surely no great matter for God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:18: No soul laden bears the load of another; and if one heavy-burdened calls for its load to be carried, not a thing of it will be carried, though he be a near kinsman.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:19: Not equal are the blind and the seeing man,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:21: the shade and the torrid heat;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:22: not equal are the living and the dead.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:23: thou art naught but a warner.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:24: Surely We have sent thee with the truth good tidings to bear, and warning; not a nation there is, but there has passed away in it a warner.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:25: If they cry thee lies, those before them also cried lies; their Messengers came to them with the clear signs, the Psalms, the Illuminating Book;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:26: then I seized the unbelievers, and how was My horror!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:27: Hast thou not seen how that God sends down out of heaven water, and therewith We bring forth fruits of diverse hues? And in the mountains are streaks white and red, of diverse hues, and pitchy black;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:28: men too, and beasts and cattle -- diverse are their hues.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:29: Surely those who recite the Book of God and perform the prayer, and expend of that We have provided them, secretly and in public, look for a commerce that comes not to naught,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:30: that He may pay them in full their wages and enrich them of His bounty; surely He is All-forgiving, All-thankful.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:31: And that We have revealed to thee of the Book is the truth, confirming what is before it; God is aware of and sees His servants.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:32: Then We bequeathed the Book on those of Our servants We chose; but of them some wrong themselves, some of them are lukewarm, and some are outstrippers in good works by the leave of God; that is the great bounty.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:33: Gardens of Eden they shall enter; therein they shall be adorned with bracelets of gold and with pearls, and their apparel there shall be of silk.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:34: And they shall say, ’Praise belongs to God who has put away all sorrow from us.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:35: who of His bounty has made us to dwell in the abode of everlasting life wherein no weariness assails us neither fatigue.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:36: As for the unbelievers, theirs shall be the fire of Gehenna; they shall neither be done with and die, nor shall its chastisement be lightened for them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:37: Therein they shall shout, ’Our Lord, bring us forth, and we will do righteousness, other than what we have done.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:38: God knows the Unseen in the heavens and the earth; He knows the thoughts within the breasts.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:39: It is He who appointed you viceroys in the earth.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:40: Say: ’Have you considered your associates on whom you call, apart from God? Show me what they have created in the earth; or have they a partnership in the heavens?’ Or have We given them a Book, so that they are upon a clear sign from it? Nay, but the evildoers promise one another naught but delusion.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:41: God holds the heavens and the earth, lest they remove; did they remove, none would hold them after Him.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:42: They have sworn by God the most earnest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more rightly guided than any one of the nations; but when a warner came to them, it increased them only in aversion,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:43: waxing proud in the land, and devising evil; but evil devising encompasses only those who do it; So do they expect anything but the wont of the ancients? And thou shalt never find any changing the Wont of God, and thou shalt never find any altering the wont of God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:44: What, have they not journeyed in the land and beheld how was the end of those before them? They were stronger than themselves in might; but God -- there is naught in the heavens or the earth that can frustrate Him.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 35:45: If God should take men to task for what they have earned He would not leave upon the face of the earth one creature that crawls; but He is deferring them to a stated term.

Muhammad Asad.verse 35:1: ALL PRAISE is due to God, Originator of the heavens and the earth, who causes the angels to be
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:2: message-bearers, endowed with wings, two, or three, or four.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:3: He adds to His creation whatever He wills: for, verily, God has the power to will anything.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:4: Whatever grace God opens up to man, none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds, none can henceforth release: for He alone is almighty, truly wise.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:5: O men! Call to mind the blessings which God has bestowed upon you! Is there any creator, other than God, that could provide for you sustenance out of heaven and earth? There is no deity save Him: and yet, how perverted are your minds!
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:6: But if they [whose minds are perverted] give thee the lie, [O Prophet, remember that] even so, before thy time, have
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:7: apostles been given the lie: for [the unbelievers always refuse to admit that] all things go back to God [as their source].
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:8: O MEN! Verily, God’s promise [of resurrection] is true indeed: let not, then, the life of this world delude you, and let not [your own] deceptive thoughts about God delude you!
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:9: Behold, Satan is a foe unto you: so treat him as a foe.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:10: [seeing that] for those who are bent on denying the truth there is suffering severe in store, just as for those who have attained to faith and do righteous deeds there is forgiveness of sins, and a great reward.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:11: Is, then, he to whom the evil of his own doings is
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:12: alluring that [in the end] he regards it as good [anything but a follower of Satan]? For, verily, God lets go astray him that wills [to go astray], just as He guides him that wills [to be guided].
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:14: it is God who sends forth the winds, so that they raise a cloud, whereupon We drive it towards dead land and thereby give life to the earth after it had been lifeless: even thus shall resurrection be!
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:15: He who desires might and glory [ought to know that] all might and glory belong to God .
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:16: Unto Him ascend all good words, and the righteous deed does He exalt.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:18: God creates [every one of] you out of dust, then out of a drop of sperm; and then He fashions you into either of the two sexes.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:19: decree: for, behold, all this is easy for God.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:20: [Easy is it for Him to create likeness and variety:] thus, the two great bodies of water [on earth] are not alike – the one sweet, thirst-allaying, pleasant to drink, and the other salty and bitter: and yet, from either of them do you eat fresh meat, and [from either] you take gems which you may wear; and on either thou canst see ships ploughing through the waves, so that you might [be able to] go forth in quest of some of His bounty, and thus have cause to be grateful.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:21: He makes the night grow longer by shortening the day, and He makes the day grow longer by shortening the night; and He has made the sun and the moon subservient [to His laws], each running its course for a term set [by Him].
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:22: If you invoke them, they do not hear your call; and even if they could hear, they would not [be able to] respond to you.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:23: on the Day of Resurrection they will utterly disown your having associated them with God.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:24: O men! It is you who stand in need of God, whereas He alone is self-sufficient, the One to whom all praise is due.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:25: If He so wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new mankind [in your stead]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:26: nor is this difficult for God.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:27: AND NO BEARER of burdens shall be made to hear another’s burden; and if one weighed down by his load calls upon
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:28: to help him carry it, nothing thereof may be carried [by that other], even if it be one’s near of kin.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:29: warn only those who stand in awe of their Sustainer although He is beyond the reach of their perception, and are constant in prayer, and [know that] whoever grows in purity, attains to purity but for the good of his own self, and
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:30: with God is all journeys’ end.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:31: For [thus it is:] the blind and the seeing are not equal;
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:32: nor are the depths of darkness and the light;
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:35: and neither are equal the living and the dead [of heart].
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:36: thou art nothing but a warner.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:37: Verily, We have sent thee with the truth, as a bearer of glad tidings and a warner: for there never was any community but a warner has [lived and] passed away in its midst.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:38: And if they give thee the lie – even so gave the lie to the truth [many of] those who lived before their time,
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:39: there came unto them their apostles with all evidence of the truth, and with books of divine wisdom, and with light-giving revelation;
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:41: in the end I took to task all those who were bent on denying the truth: and how awesome was My rejection!
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:42: ART THOU NOT aware that God sends down water from the skies whereby We bring forth fruits of many hues – just as in the mountains there are streaks of white and red of various shades, as well as
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:45: there are in men, and in crawling beasts, and in cattle, too, many hues? Of all His servants, only such as are endowed with
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:47: in awe of God: [for they alone comprehend that,] verily, God is almighty, much-forgiving.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:49: follow God’s revelation and are constant in prayer, and spend on others, secretly and openly, out of what We provide for them as sustenance – it is they who may look forward to a bargain that can never fail,
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:50: since He will grant them their just rewards, and give them yet more out of His bounty: for, verily, He is much-forgiving, ever-responsive to gratitude.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:51: And [know that] all of the divine writ with which We have inspired thee is the very truth, confirming the truth of whatever there still remains of earlier revelations – for, behold, of [the needs of] His servants God is fully aware, all-seeing.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:52: And so, We have bestowed this divine writ as a heritage unto such of Our servants as We chose: and among them are some who sin against themselves; and some who keep half-way [between right and wrong]; and some who, by God’s leave, are foremost in deeds of goodness:
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:53: this, indeed, is a merit most high!
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:55: gardens of perpetual bliss will they enter, therein to be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls, and therein to be clad in raiments of silk;
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:56: and they will say: "All praise is due to God, who has caused all sorrow to leave us: for, verily, our Sustainer is indeed much-forgiving, ever-responsive to gratitude –
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:57: He who, out of His bounty, has made us alight in this abode of life enduring, wherein no struggle can assail us, and wherein no weariness can touch us!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:58: But as for those who are bent on denying the truth – the fire of hell awaits them: no end shall be put to their lives so that they could die, nor shall aught of the suffering caused by that
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:59: be lightened for them: thus shall We requite all who are bereft of gratitude.
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:61: they will cry aloud: "O our Sustainer! Cause us to come out [of this suffering]! We shall
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:62: do good deeds, not such as we were wont to do !"
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:63: [But We shall answer:] "Did We not grant you a life long enough so that whoever was willing to take thought could bethink himself? And
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:64: a warner had come unto you! Taste, then, [the fruit of your evil deeds]: for evildoers shall have none to succour them"
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:65: VERILY, God knows the hidden reality of the heavens and the earth:
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:66: behold, He has full knowledge of what is in the hearts [of men].
Muhammad Asad.verse 35:67: He it is who has made you inherit the earth.
